posts.title: docker basic command
posts.text: 运行image1docker run -d -p --privileage 80:80 -p 22:22 zengguang/java 进入运行中的docker容器1docker exec -it container_id /bin/bash 关闭正在运行的docker容器1docker stop container_id 关闭所有正在运行的容器1docker stop $(docker ps -a) 移除容器1docker rm container_id 移除所有容器1docker rm $(docker ps -a) 移除docker镜像1docker rmi image_id 移除所有docker镜像1docker rmi $(docker images -q) 从压缩包中导入docker镜像1docker load < docker_images.tar.gz 将docker镜像打包1docker save > docker-images.tar.gz 为docker镜像打tag1docker tag <imageID> <namespace>/<imagename>:tag

posts.title: tomcat manager
posts.text: tomcat managertomcat 默认管理界面默认情况下是无法登陆的 需要在conf中设置账号和密码 角色在webapps目录下的web.xml中可以看到 123456789101112131415<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?> <tomcat-users> <role rolename="tomcat"/> <role rolename="role1"/> <role rolename="manager"/> <role rolename="admin"/> <role rolename="manager-gui"/> <role rolename="admin-gui"/> <role rolename="admin-script"/> <user username="tomcat" password="tomcat" roles="tomcat"/> <user username="admin" password="admin" roles="admin,manager,tomcat,manager-gui,admin-gui,admin-script"/> </tomcat-users> 设置了用户之后，还有可能是出现403错误 需要在conf/Catalina/localhost 下增加manager.xml，文件如下1234 <Context privileged="true" antiResourceLocking="false" docBase="${catalina.home}/webapps/manager"> <Valve className="org.apache.catalina.valves.RemoteAddrValve" allow="^.*$" /></Context>

posts.title: log4j2 tcp Appender configure
posts.text: 启动脚本1java -cp log4j-api-2.2.jar;log4j-core-2.2.jar org.apache.logging.log4j.core.net.server.TcpSocketServer 5501 server.xml 配置文件12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><configuration> <properties> <property name="directory">/log</property> <property name="filename">test</property> <!-- <property name="pattern">#%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS}|%-5.5p|%-10.10t|%-20.20C:%-5.5L|%msg%n</property> --> <property name="pattern">#%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS}|%-5.5p|%-10.10t|%c:%-5.5l|%msg%n</property> <!-- It will look like that: 2013-04-03 07:37:51.993 | WARN | main | lnetgateway.Server:56 | My app is logging stuff --> </properties> <appenders> <Console name="Console" target="SYSTEM_OUT"> <PatternLayout pattern="${pattern}" /> </Console> <RollingFile name="RollingFile" fileName="${directory}/${filename}.log" filePattern="${directory}/${date:yyyy-MM}/${filename}-%d{yyyy-MM-dd}-%i.log.gz"> <PatternLayout> <pattern>${pattern}</pattern> </PatternLayout> <Policies> <TimeBasedTriggeringPolicy /><!-- Rotated everyday --> <SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy size="100 MB" /> <!-- Or every 100 MB --> </Policies> </RollingFile> </appenders> <loggers> <root level="debug"> <!-- We log everything --> <appender-ref ref="RollingFile" /> <!-- And to a rotated file --> </root> </loggers></configuration>
